title.value: Оценка уровня социально-экономического развития на основе кластерного анализа
Estimation of social and economic development level on the basis of the cluster analysis
Estimation of social and economic development level on the basis of the cluster analysis

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Izosimova, T.N., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies of the analysis of the socio-economic state of areas and districts of republic. Such indexes, as profit, housing, wage level, size of commodity circulation were examined. The applied for this purpose cluster analysis appeared an effective method, able to conduct multidimensional classification of administrative units within the framework of the studied problem. Obtained results allow exposing dependence of the social state of regions on economic factors. The analysis has also shown that the high economic level of development of region not always renders direct influence on a condition of social sphere. Moreover, various components of social sphere are widely enough differentiated from the point of view of separate areas and administrative districts.
